CustomField.formula: IF(OR( TEXT(Selected_Payment_Type__c)='Direct Monthly', TEXT(Selected_Payment_Type__c)='Direct Quarterly', TEXT(Selected_Payment_Type__c)='Direct Semi-Annual'),TRUE,FALSE)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: this field contains indicator logic when Selected Payment Type is to Direct Monthly, Direct Quarterly or Direct Semi-Annual
CustomField.label: Selected Payment Type Group 2
